title: More Pizzas = Even More Pizzas! üçïüî•
description:
You can never have too many pizzas! That‚Äôs why we made it so every order works for the next. At Domino‚Äôs you get up to 5% back in bonuses from each purchase. 1 bonus = 1 UAH, usable for new orders or redeemed in-store.

If no promotion was applied in the order, bonuses are calculated as follows:

- Orders up to 600 UAH = 3% in bonuses
- Orders from 600 to 1,200 UAH = 4% in bonuses
- Orders above 1,200 UAH = 5% in bonuses

And 1% if any promotion is applied.

So every time you order pizza for lunch, a family dinner, a night with friends, or a corporate event, remember you‚Äôre investing in your next Domino‚Äôs pizza!

To collect bonuses, join Domino‚Äôs Club ;) Quick and easy registration ‚Äî and you‚Äôre on your way to even bigger savings! ;)

More pizzas = even more pizzas! üçï
